verses.verse: And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We will <S%H398>eat<s%> our own <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H3847>wear<s%> our own <S%H8071>apparel:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> let us be <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H622>take<s%> away our <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H6780>branch<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H6643>beautiful<s%> and <S%H3519>glorious,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1347>excellent<s%> and <S%H8597>comely<s%> for them that are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that he that is <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and he that <S%H3498>remains<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> even <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H3789>written<s%> among the <S%H2416>living<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

<S%H518>When<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have <S%H7364>washed<s%> away the <S%H6675>filth<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and shall have <S%H1740>purged<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> thereof by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1197>burning.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1254>create<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4349>dwelling<s%> place of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and on her <S%H4744>assemblies,<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H6227>smoke<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> for on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be a <S%H2646>defense.<s%>

And there shall be a <S%H5521>tabernacle<s%> for a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the day <S%H3119>time<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat,<s%> and for a place of <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> and for a <S%H5643>covert<s%> from <S%H2230>storm<s%> and from <S%H4306>rain.<s%>
